EmailTemplate.name: Notify Sales On IMPL Withdraw HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Order.OrderNumber} for {!Order.AccountLegalName__c} has been Withdrawn
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please Note {!Order.OrderNumber} for {!Order.AccountLegalName__c} and {!Order.Opportunity} has been withdrawn by {!Order.Assigned_Implementer_Name__c}.
Please refer to the ICR comments and/or the email in the attachments for withdrawal reasons
